game.name: Zombie Sniper
game.description:
A city is invaded by a horde of dangerous creatures and everywhere they are seen walking and attacking people. Oh! These evil souls are nothing, but deadly zombies which only love sucking the blood of human beings. Waiting for long can cause a big loss to your city! Go and grab your sniper rifle and get ready to put an end to their survival in Zombie Sniper! Your aim in this thrilling action game is to destroy all monsters while lumbering across the ruined streets. 
We are pretty sure that you are skilled enough to stop these bastards immediately before their frightening grip approaches you. It is time to turn you into a dangerous soul for these flesh-eating ghouls. Your win in this html5 shooter games will depend on how wisely you practice your shooting abilities. These monsters have spread all over your city. Collect your gun and hunt them down as fast as you can in the first-person shooter! Try to kill your target zombie in a one shot! 
Be careful when you enter the game as your enemies will try to come to you from every corner of the screen! Your attentiveness and sharp shooting abilities will definitely help you sail through all the hurdles and become a pro sniper in this one of the best 3D kids games. Avoid missing the target and hurting the innocent people to move to the next level! Kill all the undeads and prove the world that you have amazing skills to survive on every level!
